text: - Head titubation - Hyporeflexia - Infantile onset - Intention tremor - Lethargy - Muscle weakness - Neuronal loss in central nervous system - Optic disc pallor - Recurrent respiratory infections - Seizures - Spasticity - Unilateral vocal cord paralysis - Vomiting - X-linked recessive inheritance - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease database. The
